title: Student Code Annotation
description: List of code annotations describing specific mistakes in the student's code.

filename.description: The name of the student's file where the issue was found.

content.description: A short description of the mistake or issue.

line_start.description: The starting line number where the issue begins.

line_end.description: The ending line number where the issue ends.

column_start.description: The starting column position of the mistake.

column_end.description: The ending column position of the mistake.
